Posts.Title: Walking back to Happiness

Posts.Content: Hi totally new to this . I had my lumpectomy and sentinel node biopsy on 26th jan . Was doing really well up until last couple of days where its started to swell under my arm and my nipple where they've had to reposition it . I think i thought i was doing well and have done too much (won't admit I've got cancer i think ) . Anyway get my results this week so not really thinking straight either . I hate the waiting game . Going to go to drop in clinc tomorrow to see if it can be drained but anything i can do to reduce the discomfort xx
Posts.Title: Lumpectomy and sentinel node biopsy

Posts.Content: Been to clinic today nurse didn't need to drain under my arm whoooo . She said its healing really well and looks amazing considering its only been 11 days .  I'v been having baths with coconut oil , moisturising with calendula & hypericum cream , rosehip oil for scars and arnica tablets for bruising with amazing results .  Just to smash results on Thursday now . Feeling more positive today.  Even been out with dogs in the snow today . Good luck everyone and thanks for the help . Jo xxxx
Posts.Title: Lumpectomy and sentinel node biopsy

Posts.Content: Ok so today was results day ... and good news all the cancer is out with good margin and not spread to lymph nodes.  Now having to wait on Oncotype DX breast recurrence test to see if i need chemo . Thought i would have escaped chemo after having all clear in lymph nodes and just have radiotherapy.  So another two weeks wait now so fingers crossed again , I'm sure there going to get stuck one day with all the crossing .  Anyway having glass of wine to celebrate. Jo xx

Posts.Content: Hi Jac  I use raw coconut oil just melt it then add to bath . Definitely give it a go . Jo xx
